properties.entry: INSERT INTO TB_MATCHING ( MEET_BOARD_NO, MEET_BOARD_TITLE, PET_INFO, HOPE_ACTIVITY, USER_NO, PET_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEET_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
INSERT INTO TB_FILE(FILE_NO, REF_BNO, ORIGINAL_NAME, UPLOAD_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL) VALUES ( SEQ_FILE_NO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_MEET_BOARD_NO.CURRVAL, ?, ?, ?, ? )
SELECT PET_NO, PET_NAME, PET_SPECIES, PET_GENDER, TB_PET.USER_NO FROM TB_PET INNER JOIN TB_USER ON TB_PET.USER_NO = TB_USER.USER_NO

SELECT MEET_BOARD_NO, MEET_BOARD_TITLE, PET_INFO, HOPE_ACTIVITY, MEET_BOARD_CREATE_DATE, USER_NICKNAME, PET_NAME, MEET_BOARD_VIEWS, FILE_PATH||'/'||UPLOAD_NAME "FILE_PATH", PET_NO FROM TB_MATCHING JOIN TB_FILE ON(MEET_BOARD_NO = REF_BNO) JOIN TB_USER USING(USER_NO) JOIN TB_PET USING(PET_NO) WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND FILE_PATH = 'resources/thumbnail_upfiles' ORDER BY MEET_BOARD_NO DESC
UPDATE TB_MATCHING SET MEET_BOARD_VIEWS = MEET_BOARD_VIEWS + 1 WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND MEET_BOARD_NO = ?
